From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...>


>So far I am able to run gladiator on speed setting 8 on my 1 ghz PC
>wihtout having problems moving around while enjoying the cool sound
>effects.  That is the same speed setting I used for my 100 mhz
>computer.  Any comments about that from the gladiator programmers?

The speed settings work on a time interval basis, and should be independent 
of the clock speed .. of course, what that means is that you can go from a 
9 that's playable to a 10 that suddenly becomes a blur, because you shift 
from some small, but set, amount of time, to "go as fast as you can" :)

--Tom
